name: Staybridge Suites Austin-Round Rock

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I booked this hotel through Priority Club Rewards for only 5,000 points so I was a bit anxious to see what is what like. When I arrived I was greeted by a very courteous young man who presented me with a gift bag and altered me to the fact that happy hour was still available. I proceeded to have a quick dinner of beer and fiesta pie. This turned out to be great after over six hours in the air and two flights.
reviews.title: Very Nice Hotel North of Downtown Austin

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is nothing special from the outside and is located along a frontage road in Round Rock, 12 miles north of downtown Austin. However the rooms are very large and contain a small kitchen with microwave, oven and all the essentials you need if you decide to cook in the room. The king size bed was comfortable. The bathroom had separate doors between the sinks and showers. All functions worked well in the room. The hotel was extremely busy taking calls and booking rooms since Hurricane Ike was arriving the next day. The breakfast was above average with eggs, sausage and a wide selection of fresh, not canned, fruit which was a change. The kitchen staff were extra courteous and helpful as well. There is also a small free business center in the hotel. Overall a great hotel and cheaper than a comparable Residence Inn.
reviews.title: Best HOtel EVER

likes.liked: — overall comfort from the size of the room to the size of the towels
likes.disliked: — I can't say there was anything that I didn't like.

reviews.text: This is the best hotel I have ever stayed in!! Everything was perfect...no kidding. The room was immaculate and large. The air conditioner would get your room down to artic temps (remember I'm in Texas). The towels were large and soft. The breakfast buffet was well stocked with eggs, biscuits, oatmeal plus the usual cereals and fruits. The whole staff was pleasant and helpful.
reviews.title: Great place with a great staff

likes.disliked: — The large groups of kids that seemed to show up on the weekends

reviews.title: Absolutely horrible management
reviews.text: Its the only hotel that I've stayed in that has FREE laundry facilities available, and free business services.

description: Versatile Suites. Swimming Pool. Hot Breakfast. Exercise Room. High-Speed Internet. Sound like the perfect place to live? At the Staybridge Suites in Round Rock, our extensive list of features and amenities come together to create a hotel experience that is truly unlike any other. And with Dell World Headquarters, Round Rock Premium Outlets, IKEA, Texas State University, Southwestern University, Round Rock Hospital, Scott & White and the Dell Diamond only minutes away, you ll never be to far from Your Place . That is, if you ever decide to leave. Staybridge Suites in Round Rock. Go ahead. Get Comfortable
